roleset.name: removal, erasure
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, delete-v.01, deletion.01. Corresponds to VNcls remove-10.1.

example.name: args 1 and PRP
example.text: The deleting of messages to make room for new ones takes it even further - I hope criminal prosecutions follow because this has gone way too far .
example.arg: to make room for new ones

example.name: reversed 1 and 2
example.text: The Respondentâ€™s conduct in insisting that the laboratory technician draw an improper blood sample, and his deleting from the resulting laboratory slip the notation regarding how the sample was taken with the intention of creating false documentation of his alcohol level, constitutes conduct evidencing moral unfitness and fraud.
example.arg: the notation regarding how the sample was taken
with the intention of creating false documentation of his alcohol level
